title: 05/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Despite getting a win over the Suns, Colin believes the Lakers should be losing this playoff series if this one thing was different. He explains why the Clippers still don’t have what it takes to win a NBA Championship even with Kawhi Leonard and Paul George. Plus, former NFL QB Alex Smith joins the show to talk about his comeback from a near-career ending injury, Urban Meyer transitioning to the NFL and what he makes of the Aaron Rodgers situation with the Packers front office.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
